title: Something weird with Hextech Summoner Icon Loot
body:
Having multiple smurf accounts I ended up crafting the things such as Project Icons and Worlds Icons on multiple of my accounts and noticed something strange and I wonder if it's a bug.

Most of the time the Icon is added directly onto my list of usable Icons, but sometimes like on these pictures, it appear into my Summoner Icon Loot list, it show up the RP value too, for example the Project First Strike Ekko is 1RP https://puu.sh/s6TR0/79ae57934e.jpg while the regular Worlds Icon is 250RP https://puu.sh/s6TUQ/4a8dca9c5c.jpg.

I was wondering why does it do that, and also considering the materials for these icons dissapear on November 6th, will these Icons I didn't unlock as permanent yet also dissapear? They don't show the "Dissapear on November 6" message though.

Would be fun if someone could confirm to me wether they will dissapear or not tommorow.

replies.body:
If an icon is **upgradeable** or can be crafted into something, it will show up in your loot. Since the Worlds Icon sitting in your loot is technically *craftable material*, it should be removed soon as part of our directive to remove worlds crafting materials from accounts now that worlds has passed by.

Let me know if you have any questions.
